Thu Dec 28 03:01:35 PM UTC 2023
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/bin
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/npth-1.6/bin/npth-config /opt/bin//npth-config
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/include
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/npth-1.6/include/npth.h /opt/include//npth.h
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/lib
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/npth-1.6/lib/libnpth.la /opt/lib//libnpth.la
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/npth-1.6/lib/libnpth.so.0.1.2 /opt/lib//libnpth.so.0.1.2
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/npth-1.6/lib/libnpth.so /opt/lib//libnpth.so
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/npth-1.6/lib/libnpth.so.0 /opt/lib//libnpth.so.0
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share
ğŸš sudo install -d /opt/share//aclocal
ğŸš sudo ln -sf /opt/package/npth-1.6/share/aclocal/npth.m4 /opt/share//aclocal/npth.m4
